Klant stops and listens to what Torca had to say. He stood still, his weapo=
ns remaining hidden.

Klant: Right...

  :::Torca/Ratchet/Sideswi=
pe/Sky Lynx/Airazor::: 

  ::They stop running when they realize that the A=
lliance are heading for the 
  CF.  Torca looks to Klant:: 
  Torca:  Well,=
 partner, looks like were gonna stay here and wait for the 
  Allance to at=
tack.  We might as well prepare ourselves. 
  ::Torca pulls out his dorsal =
gun and swords, Sideswipe takes out his missle 
  launcher and rifle, Ratch=
et takes out his blasters, Sky Lynx deploys his 
  missle launchers, and Ai=
razor opens up her missle pods in her wrists.  In 
  other words, any Allia=
nce member within 10 feet of them will be doused with 
  heavy ammo:: 
    =
